name: simpleLinux Distro
short_description: A new wave of Linux Distro, simple, and small in size. From Slax, but it uses XFCE as the default window manager. Only boots 35 Seconds (On an Intel Pentium 3 500 MHz+!). simpleLinux-minimal include basic needs which is only 150 MB of size.
